attributes.action: propose Mme Christine Lagarde for the position of President of the European Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need a high profile president of the European Council.  All of the currently touted names are just the opposite.  Christine Lagarde is one of the few outstanding politicians in Europe, and would provide the leadership that Europe needs so much.

rejection.details: A President of the European Council was appointed on Thursday.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
